value:
Trec and I were part of a ragtag
group of recruits General Zelot
molded into respectable knights.

I've heard of a Sacaen warrior called
the Saint of Swords who fought off
an entire bandit horde all by himself.

If I may be blunt, I'm not here for
friendship. All I ask is that you tell me
when and where to strike the enemy.

It's not like I'm expecting to save the
world or anything...but at times I do
wonder what all of this fighting is for.

Oh, these? They're supplies I need
to write an important letter someday.
For now, the page remains blank.

I have been contracted to deliver
these supplies on behalf of your
ally, $Nf.

The chaos of the battlefield requires
quick thinkingâ€”as long as you don't
disobey a direct order, of course.

I presume your strategy predicted
this result? I am ready and waiting
for your next command.

Yesterday's friend may be today's
foe... The reality of mercenary work
in times of conflict is harsh.

I fight only for my homeland's sake.
What money I earn goes directly into
providing for those back home.

I'm Noah, of the Ilian mercenaries.
It's always good to gather more allies.
I look forward to working together.

Ilian mercenary squads are always
accompanied by a small detachment
of non-combatant pegasus riders.$k$pThese women are responsible for a
sacred duty should any soldiers fall
in battle.$k$pUpon such a loss, they will return to
Ilia to deliver a special letter to the
loved ones of the deceased.$k$pThe other knights who enlisted with
me have already given their letters
to the riders. I haven't yet...$k$pWhen I imagine the heartbroken face
of a family member or lover when my
letter arrives on their doorstep, I...$k$pI don't want to inflict that sort of
pain on anyone. The stronger the
bond, the easier your heart breaks.$k$pWhether or not you agree, you can
at least understand where I'm coming
from, can't you?$k$pPlease, there's no need to look at me
like that, Summoner. You can be sure
that I won't let my death come easily.
Leave this to me.
You're mine!
I will face anyone.
For Ilia!
So be it...
Yes.
Well met. I am Noah, of Ilia's knights.
Oh! You certainly are a friendly one, aren't you?
I see Fir hasn't changed at all. Even here in Askr, she's still striving to hone her sword skills.
Following orders is admirable, certainly, but sometimes the only way to win is by improvising.
It is thanks to General Zelot that I've been able to come this far.
Nobles from other countries say that Ilia survives by...peddling death... Is it so?
For you, I will fight to the best of my ability. Anything, if it means not losing you.
Very well.
What next?
Rest assured.
